posts.post_content:
I wasn't planning to sell this card, but I'm in bulk accumulation mode right now, so I need to swap out quality for quantity. Eventually I will be buying a version of this card back.

The person I acquired this from indicated it was an SGC A snap out, and my assumption is that it might be trimmed. That said, it is a very clean copy, as you can see from the scans. Light corner wear, but still sharp, very good registration and very bright colors, especially on the front. 

SOLD

[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51857145578_11559f8b03_c.jpg[/img]

[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51857145798_2e34bd7db3_c.jpg[/img]
Great looking example! One of the best portraits in the T206 set. GLWS.
